授業方法: The text will be followed quite closely. Classes will usually begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair work.

第1回: Course overview; Start of Fall Term - Discussion Questions (two rounds); instructor's schedule.
第5回: First assignment due. Text, unit 4, pp. 40-41.
第8回: Second assignment topic due. Text, unit 5.
第12回: Final report topic due. Text, unit 6.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and (when appropriate) review. They are also required to bring a pen or pencil, paper and a dictionary to class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
